<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_hr_sp_todo_filter_m2m_filter</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent invalid filter_m2m filter</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (current.todo_parent_filter.is_filter_group == false) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Filters can not have Associated subfilters')); current.setAbortAction(true); return; } else { var util = new sn_ex_sp.TodosFilterUtil(); var isNewRecord = current.isNewRecord();
if ((isNewRecord || current.todo_parent_filter != previous.todo_parent_filter) && util.getParentFiltersMappingIds(current).indexOf(current.todo_parent_filter) === -1) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Invalid parent filter selected')); current.setAbortAction(true); }
if ((isNewRecord || current.todo_child_filter != previous.todo_child_filter) && util.getChildFiltersMappingIds(current).indexOf(current.todo_child_filter) === -1) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Invalid child filter selected')); current.setAbortAction(true); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-08 17:12:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>14290fbdd4799110f87760108289e50e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent invalid filter_m2m filter</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_14290fbdd4799110f87760108289e50e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-13 14:06:44</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=14290fbdd4799110f87760108289e50e"/> </record_update>
